Text: Your Jasc Software Order ECPST Dear Robert Thank you for your order We hope you will enjoy your new purchase and we sincerely appreciate your support of Jasc Software This email is to confirm we have received your order and are processing it Please print and keep a copy of this email for your records If you have any questions about your order please feel free to visit our Customer Service page at contactservicesasp for quick and easy answers You can also contact our friendly Customer Service team directly by email mailto or by phone Mon Fri am to pm US Central Time Here is your order and billing information Please look for Jasc Software Inc on your credit card statement Customer Number Order Number EC Billing Address Robert Richey Canterra Tower rd Ave Enron Canada Calgary AB TGX CAN Email Address Quantity Price Item ESD Jasc Paint Shop Pro Anniversary Edition Product Total Shipping Charges Download Delivery Tax Total If you would prefer to download your ESD software later you will need the following information to start the download Please note that the password is case sensitive and must be typed exactly as shown This information is confidential and is not intended for anyone other than you the buyer Order Number EC Password GWbtuit To begin downloading simply go to shoppingesdesdloginasp and login with your order number and password If you need further assistance or if you experience any difficulties with the download process please contact our Customer Service team see contact information above Again from all of us here at Jasc thank you for your order Please contact us if we can offer further assistance Your friends at Jasc Software PS If you find you need technical help while working with your new Jasc Software solution please stop by our Technical Support Center at supportasp You can use our knowledge base search to get answers instantly Our Technical Support team is also available by email mailto or by phone Mon Fri am to pm US Central Time Were here to help
